name: Yahuar Pampa
description:
A first-year game design student project - a tower defense taking place in mesoamerican civilisation.

Putting ressource management and production at the center of its gameplay, Yahuar Pampa is a student project made in three weeks of work where the player has to push back an invasion from an hostile neighboring civilisation.

The has a limited amount of men to assign to the different buildings to either defeat the enemies that keep coming or to produce ressources such as food or more people. The key to victory is to know when and where to assign your men to maximise damages and production.
